content: sewing needle and pull tightly through the first st of step 19 first photo then weave through the back loop only of your last st and pull up your tail next weave through the front loop only the left loop under the front loop and 5 or so sts across the coaster photo 2 weave down through the next row photo 3 and go backwards through this row photo 4 when you have barely any tail visible carefully pull your coaster horizontally and your tail should hide itself in the coaster you have completed your cup coaster you may sell the finished items from this pattern however re-uploading or selling my pattern is not allowed copyright belongs to carlie junor craft creatively the next page contains photos and credits to the testers thank you all again finished cup coasters designer bernathandicrafter jenniferphilpott lionbrand debbiemccoyhobbylobby dawnbush-lilysugar n incoralsea witha4 5mm re-upinsaffron witha iltyinpewter witha5 5m creampotpourriombrewitha hook 4 00mmhook hook 4 00mmhook missyrichard hobbylobby cjconway-lidlspringin sarahjo-hobbylobby lindseymarshall-babybee iltyingreybeard witha purple witha3 75mmhook crafter ssecretcottonmulti sweetdelightinsage witha 5 5mmhook incitywitha4 00mmhook 4 5mmhook
